data.title: Elon Musk Issues Shock Prediction As $38.3 Trillion ‘Crisis’ Primes A Bitcoin Price Boom To Rival Gold
data.description: Elon Musk has predicted “money disappears as a concept” in the future, with energy the only “true currency"...
data.author: Billy Bambrough
data.keywords: Elon Musk,bitcoin,bitcoin price,crypto,gold,U.S. debt,bitcoin price prediction
